title: PHPis_int()Function

metadata.description: Learn about PHPis_int()Function with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
Example
content_sections.code:
"; $b = 0; echo "b is " . is_int($b) . "
"; $c = 32.5; echo "c is " . is_int($c) . "
"; $d = "32"; echo "d is " . is_int($d) . "
"; $e = true; echo "e is " . is_int($e) . "
"; $f = "null"; echo "f is " . is_int($f) . "
"; ?>

summary: This tutorial covers PHPis_int()Function concepts and techniques. You'll learn how to use PHPis_int()Function effectively, including key principles, common patterns, and practical examples. By the end of this tutorial, you'll have a solid understanding of PHPis_int()Function and how to apply it in your projects.
